Jessica Harllee

  1. Work
  2. Notes
  3. About

I’m Jessica Harllee and I’m a product designer at Etsy in Brooklyn, New York. Previously, I was a designer at Kickstarter and at Modea. I build software that enables independent artists and have a preference for anything handmade.

I own too many sweaters, listen to a constant stream of music, and believe that great design is nothing without great copy. I’m obsessed with process, organization, and uncovering the best way to do something. I’m probably shorter than you. Currently, my favorite emoji is the sweat smile.

One day I hope to run a 10K (did it!), sell something that I make (did it!), do an unassisted handstand, and have a library of floor-to-ceiling bookshelves in my home.

Get in touch via email or Twitter.

Jessica Harllee is a product designer at Etsy in Brooklyn, an avid crafter, and an amateur writer.
